name: DeadMom
description:
Hola bienvenido a mi prototipo de un concepto que vengo queriendo desarrollar desde hace tiempo, la historia de dos pequeños niños con mascaras de conejos huyendo de pesadillas al estilo dreamcore donde se busca que la experiencia sea la mas inmersiva y mas terrorífica a la vez de inquietante, no cuento con fondos mas que mi propio dinero agradezeria mucho a cualquiera que me apoye a cumplir con mi sueño

Hello, welcome to my prototype of a concept that I have been wanting to develop for a long time, the story of two little children with rabbit masks fleeing from dreamcore-style nightmares where the experience is sought to be the most immersive and terrifying at the same time as disturbing. I do not have funds other than my own money. I would be very grateful to anyone who supports me in fulfilling my dream
